japanese:
ぐう……ううん……。
むにゃむにゃ……。
translation:
*snore* Nnnhh...
Mmmh-mmmhh...

japanese: よし、まだ寝てるわね。
translation: Good, still sleeping, huh.

japanese:
ふふ、フー君ってばぐっすり眠ってる。
かわいー！
translation: Teehee, Fu-kun is sleeping soundly. How CUTE!

japanese:
（……誰だ？　誰かが……
　ダメだ、眠くて……うーん、この声は……）
translation:
(...Who's that? Someone's...
 Dang, I'm so sleepy... Nnnhh, whose voice is...?)

japanese:
それにしても……本当によく眠ってるけど、
誰かに薬盛られてたりしないわよね？
translation:
At any rate... You're sleeping really well,
nobody drugged you, right?

japanese:
……そうじゃないか。
フー君、頑張りすぎてるのよ。
もう少し力を抜いてもいいのに。
translation:
...That can't be it.
Fu-kun, you're trying too hard.
Even though it's okay for you to relax a little.

japanese:
そんなに私たち……
ううん、私って頼りにならない？
translation:
Are we not%p-2;――
%p;Am I not that reliable?

japanese:
今回のことだって
フー君は巻き込まれちゃっただけで……
責任もないのにあんなに頑張っちゃって。
translation:
This time, when getting involved in our activities, Fu-kun...
You worked really hard even without any responsibility towards us.

japanese:
……こうして寝てると
普通の男の子の寝顔なんだけどなあ。
translation:
...When you're sleeping like this,
you just look like a normal guy.

japanese:
今ならなにされても起きなさそうね。
た、例えば……キ、キス、とか。
translation:
No matter what happens to you, you're not going to wake up.
E-even...k-kissing you wouldn't wake you up.

japanese:
ああもう、なんでこんなに悩んでるの私！
フー君には正々堂々アプローチするって決めたのに。
translation:
Oh NO, why am I so worried?!
Even though I decided to approach Fu-kun directly.

japanese: でも……今なら、誰も見てないし……。
translation: But...now, no one's watching...

japanese:
んあ……。
二乃か？　なにブツブツ言ってるんだよ……。
translation:
Nnaah...
Nino? What are you mumbling about...?

japanese:
お、おはようフー君！
ごめんなさい、起こしちゃったかしら？
translation:
G-good morning, Fu-kun!
I'm so sorry, did I wake you up?

japanese:
横でブツブツ言われてたら
いくらなんでも起きるだろ。
translation:
Standing next to me and talking to yourself,
will wake me up no matter what.

japanese: え、ええと、その……どこから聞いてたわけ？
translation: U-umm, well... How much did you hear?

japanese:
いや、はっきり聞き取れたわけじゃない。
聞かれて困るようなことでも言ってたのか？
translation:
No, I couldn't hear anything.
Did you say anything that you didn't want me to hear?

japanese:
えっ？
そ、それはぁ……。
translation:
Um?
Th-that's...

japanese: んんんん～？　それはなんだって？
translation: Hmmmmm? Spit it out, then.

japanese:
こ、困ることなんてないわよ！
私はただ起こしに来ただけなんだもの！
translation:
I-I wouldn't be troubled if you asked me!
I only came to wake you up!

japanese:
その様子……
さてはまた落書きするつもりだったな？
translation:
The way you're acting...
Were you going to scribble on my face again?

japanese:
違うわよ！
だいたい、あれはリップですぐ落ちたでしょ！
translation:
No!
And, that was just lipstick! It came off easily!

japanese:
じゃ、なにするつもりだったんだ。
困らないなら正直に言えるよな？
translation:
So, what did you intend to do?
Spit it out if it's not a problem?

japanese:
あっ、そうだわ忘れてた。
今日は三玖が朝食を作るって言ってたから
手伝ってあげないと！
translation:
Oh yeah right!
Today, Miku said she was going to make breakfast,
and I've gotta help her.

japanese:
ほら、フー君も早く準備して！
早く行かないとあの子、何を生み出すか
わからないわよ？
translation:
Come on, hurry up, Fu-kun!
We don't know what she'll bring into existence if we don't go soon,
you know?

japanese: 三玖も最近じゃ割とできてるだろ？
translation: But, Miku's doing pretty well recently, right?

japanese:
確かに腕は上がったけど、
妙な隠し味を入れたがったりするのは
そのままなのよ！
translation:
Her skill has certainly increased,
but her habit of sneaking in secret ingredients
hasn't changed a bit!

japanese:
とにかく先に行ってるわね。
それじゃ！
translation:
Anyway, I'll head out first.
See ya!

japanese:
（嵐のように去って行ったな。
　結局、人の枕元で何を言ってたんだ……）
translation:
(She went out like a storm.
 Just what was she mumbling about near my face...?)
